item.title: Bachelor available at 141 Davisville Avenue, Toronto
item.address: 141 Davisville Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4S 2Y
item.description: Address: 141 Davisville Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4S 2Y <p>Visit our Website: http://www.caprent.com/Properties/Ontario/Toronto/141_Davisville.aspx</p><p>Rental office is located at 33 Davisville Avenue</p><p>These apartments for rent in Toronto are located in the heart of midtown at Yonge & Davisville. The beautiful site comprised of 33, 111 and 141 Davisville Avenue is steps away from the Yonge/Davisville subway station and no more than 15 minutes away from the cosmopolitan downtown core of Toronto. With a Walk Score of 90 and Transit Score of 89 Davisville Village Apartments shares its trendy neighbourhood with great shops, superior restaurants, nightclubs, and theatres. Convenient access to several schools and daycare centres as well as tennis courts and parks makes the Yonge and Davisville area great for families. <br /><br />Meet your friends at the local Starbucks for coffee, jog along the Beltline, and stroll along Yonge Street on a Saturday afternoon - take advantage of all this trendy midtown residential neighbourhood has to offer. <br /><br />Ask us about our modern fully furnished suites at this location</p><p>Parking from: $80.00</p><p> </p>What's included in your rent<p>Water, Heat</p><p>Have Questions? Contact the Property Manager: (416) 489-7368</p><p> </p>Building FeaturesCable readyPrivate balcony with good views from most suitesTwo bedrooms have two bathrooms (in some suites)Large living room windowsEfficient kitchen with frost free fridge and stoveSpacious closetsGood-sized bedroomsBathroom with tiled tub surroundEasy to clean parquet tilesCeramic or tiled foyerIndoor Pool at 111 Davisville also available to residents from 33 and 141 DavisvilleSecure building with controlled secure entry, on-site professional and friendly staff as well as after-hours Emergency hotlineRenovated elevatorsLaundry facilities are card operated and open 24 hoursRoof top patio and sauna available at 111 Davisville for all tenants<p> </p>Neighbourhood FeaturesTransit Score of 89: 2-minute walk east of Davisville Subway station15 minutes to downtown by subwayOn the bus route to Sunnybrook hospital (Route #11)Walk Score of 90: local parks with swing set, slides, and tennis court and walking trailsCoffee shops at the corner of Yonge & Davisville: Tim Hortons, Starbucks, and Second CupNearby plaza with dry cleaner, video rental, hair salon and SobeysDavisville Medical Centre that includes dental servicesConvenience store on Davisville: Hasty MarketGrocery stores in the area: Metro (Yonge/Eglinton) and Valu-Mart (Davisville/Bayview) Schools in the immediate area: Davisville Junior Public School which has a deaf and hard of hearing program,  Hodgson Senior Public, North Toronto Collegiate Institute Day Care and After School Programs: Special Moments Child Care Centre, Davisville

item.title: Furnished 1Bdr+den 12 Yonge Financial Dist./Union station
item.address: 200 Dufferin Street, City Of Toronto, ON, Canada, M6K 1Y
item.description: Address: 200 Dufferin Street, City Of Toronto, ON, Canada, M6K 1Y Convenient location – minutes from financial district, Air Canada Centre, underground path, train/subway stations, supermarkets and highways. Spacious and luxurious 1 bedroom + den, fully furnished and spotless! <br />The Suite: <br />The unit is fully furnished with brand new dark hardwood floors and 9ft floor to ceiling windows. Beautiful spacious kitchen with granite counter top and stainless steel appliances and large amount of cupboard space to fit pots and pans, separate dining area with beautiful chandelier and textured wallpaper, large living area to entertain your guests, modern washroom with granite counter top, spacious closets in the entrance and bedroom, large balcony with amazing city view and full size washer and dryer. <br /> <br />Furnished Unit includes: <br />Bedroom has queen bed and living room’s sofa converts into a bed <br />Expandable dining table with 4 chairs <br />New 42’’Flat screen HDTV and WD TV Live media player <br />En-suite laundry (full size washer and dryer) <br />Fully equipped kitchen with pots/pans/dishware/utensils, Keurig Coffee machine <br />High-end Dyson vacuum <br />All utilities (hydro, electricity, water) <br />*Executive rental maybe considered at extra cost <br /> <br />Amenities: <br />Pinnacle Centre also contains the spectacular Pinnacle Club which is an impressive multi-level indoor/outdoor, social, fitness, spa, and meeting facility. The facility features an indoor swimming pool, whirlpool, state of the art fitness centre, and separate saunas. The club is also home to billiards, meeting rooms, guest suites, party room and a luxurious lounge/reading room. Outside, you will find a golf centre, tennis court, running track and exquisitely landscaped terrace. The Pinnacle is also a highly secured building with 24 hour concierge and cameras around the building. Visitor underground parking is also available. <br /> <br />Rental Conditions: <br />12 months lease preferable, deposit required. <br />Optional: Internet, landline and cable are available at cost. <br /> <br />Absolutely Non-Smoking. No pets allowed. <br />Reference and Credit Check. First and last month in advance. <br />Please call 647- 802-7662 for viewing.

item.title: Villa Nova - 530 Scarlett Rd- Scarlett and Eglinton- 2 Bedrooms
item.address: 530 Scarlett Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M9P 2S
item.description: Address: 530 Scarlett Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M9P 2S <p>Villa Nova<br />530 Scarlett Road, Toronto, Ontario<br /><br /></p><p> 416-241-9126- Call today for a tour!<br /><br /></p><p>Renovated Two bedroom available May 1st.<br />Starting at $1,450.00 inclusive.<br />Parking is ranging from $60 to $70 a month.</p><p></p><p>NEWLY RENOVATED<br />Renovations can include: wood plank and ceramic tile, updated bathroom and kitchen, stainless steel appliances, new modern fixtures.</p><p> </p><p>NEWLY RENOVATED<br /> Renovations can include: wood plank and ceramic tile, updated bathroom and kitchen, stainless steel appliances, new modern fixtures.</p><p> </p><p> Property Amenities </p><p>-Close to Bus Route<br />-Close to Schools<br />-Close to Shopping<br />-Dedicated On-Site Staff<br />-Elevators<br />-Laundry facilities<br />-Outdoor parking<br />-Outdoor pool<br />-Pet Friendly<br />-Pre-Authorized Payment Options<br />-Visitor parking<br />-Wheelchair access<br /><br />Villa Nova is located in the quiet suburban area of Etobicoke with views of downtown to the east and tree lined streets to the west. The building is situated on Scarlett Road, two blocks north of Eglinton Ave West. Public transit is conveniently located at your front door and schools, local shops and restaurants are within walking distance. Our friendly, professional staff are on site 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for your convenience. Suites are large with new balconies and windows. There is a wonderful outdoor pool, which is a great place to spend those hot summer days with family and friends.</p><p>Please visit our website for more details and to view our virtual tour, or apply online!<br />HOMESTEAD.CA<br />Never worry about writing a rent cheque again! Our pre-authorized payment options will make paying your rent as easy as ever.<br /><br />*prices and availability subject to change. Pictures are for reference only.</p>

item.title: Valleyview Towers - 2980 Don Mills Rd- One Bedroom
item.address: 2980 Don Mills Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M2J 3B
item.description: Address: 2980 Don Mills Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M2J 3B <p>VALLEYVIEW TOWERS<br />2980 Don Mills Rd, Toronto ON</p><p>416-499-4773 – Call today for a tour!<br /><br />Renovated One bedroom unit available May 1st.</p><p>Starting at $1,250.00 inclusive.<br />Parking is ranging from $60 to $70 a month.</p>Property AmenitiesClose to Bus RouteClose to SchoolsClose to ShoppingDedicated On-Site StaffElevatorsLaundry facilitiesOnline Payment AvailableOutdoor parkingPet FriendlyPre-Authorized Payment OptionsVisitor parking<p>Suite Amenities</p>BalconiesFridgeStove Valleyview Towers is located near Sheppard and Don Mills, directly across from the North York Oriole Community Resource Centre. The Centre offers a variety of sports activities for the entire family, such as tennis, skating, exercise programs, and much more. The Sheppard Subway line is located within a five minute walk from the building. This line joins the Yonge Subway line, with a direct link to downtown. The 404 is minutes away for those who travel by car. Fairview Mall is located within a 5 minute walk, which offers a very wide selection of shops, restaurants, grocery stores, banks and specialty shops. The Fairview Public Library is located just a few minutes from the building, on Don Mills and the George Vanier School is across the street from Valleyview Towers.<p>HOMESTEAD.CA</p><p><br />We offer pre-authorized debit and online banking to make paying rent easy and simple.</p><p>*prices and availability subject to change. Pictures are for reference only.</p>

item.description: Address: 2859 TeRRASSe TRACY, LONGueuiL, QC, Canada, J4L 1T Beautiful 1 bedroom condo with a garden view balcony ideally located at 950 Notre-Dame west on then 2dh floor of the Lowney 5-6-7, with fireplace. <br />Located Downtown Montreal, it is steps away from L'ETS (Ecole de technologie supérieure), Old Montreal, Lachine Canal, Place Bonaventure. Supermarket, Convenient store, Metro station, Bell Centre, etc... <br /> <br />The condo is FULLY furnished and includes all stainless steel appliances. Fridge, Stove, Microwave oven, dishwasher, washer BOSCH, dryer BOSCH, TV SONY, complete kitchen furniture, complete living room furniture, complete bedroom furniture, even sheets, towels, curtains, dishware, glassware, utensils. All you will need is your luggage to bring your clothes with you. <br />A storage unit (Locker) is included as well. <br />The building is very secure with increased security and the common areas include the urban chalet that has a fire place, there is a cinema room, an exterior pool on the rooftop, whirlpool, lounge chairs, BBQ, etc... <br />Inside there is a gym with great equipment as well as a sauna and lap pool. <br />If you would like to schedule a visit or have any questions, please call or text 514-827-4722 <br /> <br /> <br />Très beau condo avec un balcon donnant une vue sur le jardin situé idéalement au 950 rue Notre-Dame ouest au 2eme étage du Lowney 5-6-7, avec cheminée <br /> <br />Au centre-ville de Montréal . L'ETS (Ecole de technologie supérieure), du Centre-Ville de Montréal, du Vieux Montréal, du Canal Lachine et de la Place Bonaventure. Super Marché, Dépanneur, Station de Métro, Centre Bell, etc.... <br />Il y a une chambre fermée et le condo est completement meublé avec tous les éléctroménagers en acier inoxydable. Réfrigerateur, Four, Four micro-ondes, lave- vaiselle, laveuse, sécheuse, TV, set de table de cuisine, set de salon complet, air climatisé, set de chambre complet, y inclus les draps, serviettes,rideaux, Vaisselier, ustensils, vaisselle. Vous n'avez qu'à emmener votre linge dans vos valises. <br />Il y a aussi un espace de rangement (Locker). <br /> <br />L'édifice est super sécuritaire avec surveillance accrue et les aires communs incluent un chalet urbain avec un foyer, une salle de cinéma maison, une piscine extérieure sur le toit, bain tourbillon, chaises longues, BBQ, etc... <br />A l'intérieur il ya aussi un gym très bien équipé y inclus un sauna et un bassin de nage intérieur. <br /> <br />Pour faire une demande de visite ou si vous avez des questions, S.V.P

item.title: *Old Montreal/Port* classy, best location, top notch building
item.address: 7843 Ave BODiNieR, MONTReAL ANJOu, QC, Canada, H1K1C2
item.description: Address: 7843 Ave BODiNieR, MONTReAL ANJOu, QC, Canada, H1K1C2 Hi there! My name is Martin (owner) and I've lived in this amazing apartment for 3 years. I absolutely love this apartment; the location can't be beat, the building is top notch, the other tenants are great people, and, last but certainly not least, the summers in Old Montreal/Port are truly unforgettable. And if I could stay, I would -- but I will be moving out end of February to pursue a dream opportunity. <br /> <br />Details outlined below -- thanks for your interest, happy hunting and good luck! <br /> <br />Martin <br />---------------------------------------------------------- <br />About the Location: <br />"Can't be beat!" <br />- Walk 1 min to: dry cleaners, depanneur/convenient store (which is awesome by the way!), metro (Champ des Mars), gym, take a walk on the old Montreal cobblestone streets (Rue Sainte Paul) <br />- Metro 1 stop away/Walk 5 mins to: China town, the grocery store (IGA), banks, central metro station (Berri-UQAM, yellow, green, orange line), watch the boats in old port (Saint-Laurent river), clock tower beach (with real sand in the Summer!), all types of restaurants, bars, and small boutiques <br />- Metro 10 mins to: corporate buildings on Rene levesque, McGill/Concordia, Plateau <br />- Special Events: 2 mins walk to Igloofest (JAN/FEB), 1 metro stop to Jazz fest (JUN) and Place-des-Arts museum, 20 mins metro to Osheaga (AUG) <br />- Noise: Very quiet (will not hear cars/events across the street) <br />- Neighborhood: Extremely safe and clean neighborhood (since it is a tourist area. . .so you get all the perks without the noise!) <br /> <br />About the Building/unit: <br />"Top notch!" <br />- High ceilings, wood floors, central heating, Juliet balcony, around 700 sq ft, true closed door bedroom, full bathroom <br />- Rooftop standing pool and lounge deck area. . .one of the best spots in Montreal to enjoy the summer fireworks every 10pm on Saturday <br />- Phone buzz to enter for guests <br />- Built in 2004 and renovated twice since then; building committee do a great job with the up keep <br />- Parking in the building available <br /> <br />Terms & Price: <br />- Monthly Rent: $1775 (furnished, negotiable), $1500 (unfurnished), <br />- Lease length: 12 months, 6-months (furnished only) <br />- Security deposit: $950 (to be returned after 3 months and replaced with a post-dated check) <br />- Monthly utilities: estimated $70 (not included) <br />- Cable/Internet: estimated $100 (not included) <br /> <br />About you: <br />You are a respectful and reasonable individual (or couple) that is capable of meeting rent requirements on time. Other than that. . .all are welcome! <br /> <br />Next steps: <br />- When can I move in?

item.description: Address: 60 Avenue Des Pins Ouest, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2W 1R 25 Pins Avenue West building is located near the Sherbrooke, Place des Arts and Sainte-Laurent Metro stations. <br /> <br />All studio apartments are elegantly renovated with hard wood floors and are spacious, with lots of sunlight. <br /> <br />Professional on-site management office is in the building to make sure tenants all needs are taken care. <br /> <br />Centrally located in a very exciting and vibrant part of Montreal, 25 Pins Avenue West is a step from shopping, banks, public transportation, bars, cafes, dining, nightlife, schools and parks. <br /> <br />It is a 5 minute walk to Metro Sherbrooke and Metro Place-des-Arts. <br /> <br />Bus stops are located just outside our front door giving you easy access to all public transportation. <br /> <br />Rent includes: Heating, hot water, fridge, stove and free wireless internet. <br /> <br />Unlimited usage of high speed wireless internet. <br /> <br />Apartment are professionally cleaned and freshly painted. <br /> <br />Energie Cardio fitness center close by. <br /> <br />Friendly and safe neighbourhood. <br /> <br />Spacious well planned floor plans. <br /> <br />Walking distance to Mont Royal and to McGill College. <br /> <br />Fantastic for student roommates and professionals. <br /> <br />Live in Concierge on-site maintenance and cleaning staff. <br /> <br />24/7 Live Video Surveillance for security. <br /> <br />Dogs and cats are welcome. <br /> <br />*** Inquire about our special promotion for new leases signed in February*** <br /> <br />For more information please visit www.25pins.com, or call 514 561 6116 or 514 299 2500. <br />---- <br /> <br /> <br />25 Avenue des Pins est un établissement situé près des métros Sherbrooke, Place-des-Arts et Saint-Laurent. Tout les appartements studios sont rénovés d'une façon très élégante avec des planchers en bois franc. <br /> <br />Ils sont aussi spacieux et ont accès a beaucoup de lumière naturelle. <br /> <br />Une équipe de gestion professionnelle est sur place afin d'assurer que toutes les nécéssités des clients sont comblés. <br /> <br />Situé dans un lieu très animé de Montréal, 25 Avenue des Pins west est à quelques minutes de marche de plusieurs boutiques, banques, transport publique, bars, cafés, restaurants, écoles, parcs et de clubs de nuit. Il est aussi à 5 minutes de marche du métro Sherbrooke et Place-des-Arts. <br /> <br />Le loyer inclu: L'eau chaude, le chauffage, appareils ménagers et de l'internet sans fil gratuit. <br /> <br />Utilisation illimit&eac

item.description: Address: 129 Oak Park Ave, East York, ON, Canada, M4C 4M7 Definitely NOT a basement!  <br /> <br />Beautiful sunny one-bedroom apartment on main floor of this 1875 Victorian Gothic gabled charmer. ? <br /> <br />Walk in to huge east-and north-facing windows in kitchen/living room, soaring 10-foot ceilings, original hardwood floors with 8-inch baseboards. West-facing windows in bedroom and 4-piece bathroom catch the evening sun all year round. Built-in cupboards and deep closets provide needed storage space. Private covered entrance and front BBQ stoop. Private in-suite laundry.  <br /> <br />On a quiet one-way street in Historic Newmarket, this unit is steps to library, shops and cafes, fine dining, Nokidaa walking and biking trails, parks and recreational facilities, spin studio, hot yoga, Seasonal Farmers' Market, and Riverwalk Commons. It's the absolute best neighbourhood in town, that's why they built it first!  <br /> <br />Centrally located, only 5 blocks to Southlake Regional Healthcare Facility to the east, Courthouse and Regional Offices to the west, and Municipal Offices to the south.  <br /> <br />$1055 includes all heat, hydro, water, in-suite laundry, and heritage charm!  <br />Professional yard care and snow removal also included.  <br /> <br />SUITS ONLY ONE PERSON with parking for one car only  <br /> <br />No pets or smokers, please.  <br /> <br />To BOOK A SHOWING go to HeritageSuite.com.  <br />Click on the Book a Showing link. item.description: Address: 806 Cherrier, Plateau, QC, Canada, H2L1H4 Profitez-en payez $1200 de loyer au lieu de $1500 à partir du 1er MARS jusqu'à 30 JUIN. on demande moins parce qu'on a acheté une maison et on doit démenager le 1er mars. Alors on fait une offre special et on paie la balance de $300 mensuels jusqu'à le mois de juin. Après ça, si vous voulez renouveler le contrat vous pouvez le faire avec le propietaire. C'est une très belle maison d'un étage avec 2 chambres + 1 solarium comme bureau,1 salle de bain, 1 salle de lavage, cuisine et salle à manger. Animaux acceptés petits ou gros. Il n'y a pas de sous-sol. Stationnement double juste pour la maison. Situé à 30 sec du métro sauvé et 1 min du train de banlieu. Le parc ahuntsic est à quelque pas ainsi que la place fleury. LE CEGEP Ahuntsic et Grasset sont très prêts. <br />La cour arrière sera vous charmer avec ses quelques 4000 pc de superficie. Il y a des framboisiers à vous couper le souffle, un super coin jardin, deux arbres fruitiers comestibles soit un cerisier et poirier...avec un patio sur 3 niveaux pour vous assurer du bon temps de repos à Montréal... <br />La maison a été rénové depuis plus de 17 ans et tout est impeccable. <br />contactez Manuel: 514-575-21-69 ou Alexandra: 514-574-04-91

item.title: Spacious One Bedroom W/Cathedral Ceilings In Collingwood
item.address: 60 St Clair Ave W, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4V
item.description: Address: 60 St Clair Ave W, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4V Available for Mar. 1st, 2016. This oversize one bedroom condo is located on Trott Blvd., across the road from Cranberry Inn. It is centrally located and close to all that Blue Mountain has to offer. Just 10 minutes to the Village & ski lifts, 5 minutes to downtown Collingwood and a short walk to the shores of Georgian Bay. This is a large main floor unit that offers one bedroom (master) with an ensuite bathroom. There is an open concept living room and kitchen area with a vaulted ceiling. This spacious unit can be either furnished as is or unfurnished and has a dining area and powder room off the living room area. There is a gas fireplace in the living room. There is a sliding door leading out from living room onto the deck. There is a beautiful kitchen with all the amenities, including a dishwasher. There is tile and carpet throughout, and the unit also comes with a stacked washer/dryer and plenty of closet space. No pets. Rent + utilities. Non-smoking unit, Annual rentals.

item.title: Britannia Newly Renovated Penthouse Corner Condo
item.address: 683 Churchill Avenue North, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1Z 5G
item.description: Address: 683 Churchill Avenue North, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1Z 5G Be the first to enjoy this newly renovated 1,120 square foot penthouse condo unit with stunning Ottawa River views from all windows, living room, dining room, and balcony! Enjoy complete privacy and serenity in this top floor corner unit with north and east exposures, and a 20-foot long balcony. Newly renovated kitchen features beautiful new high quality solid wood "Alabaster" white Kitchen Craft cabinets with pantry rollout drawers, pot drawers, Italian "Earth Glitter" granite counters, 4 new SS appliances (fridge has icemaker) and a new open concept layout. Main bathroom features new tub with new seamless shower walls/ceiling. Master Bedroom features walk-in closet, ensuite, and access to balcony. Apartment is freshly painted throughout with HW and ceramic floors. Large storage room in unit. Includes one heated, secure underground parking spot and car-washing bays. Enjoy the abundant amenties in this well-managed/maintained building in the "Northwest One" complex, including a large indoor heated saltwater swimming pool, sauna, gym, tennis courts, library, games rooms, outdoor shuffle board, and woodworking shop. On the Ottawa River bike/walking paths. 5 minute walk to Britannia Beach, Farm Boy, Metro, Shopper's Drug Mart, and OC Transpo routes. "Resort" living with plentiful recreational opportunities, beautiful park space, Mud Lake nature sanctuary, and lots of activities to enjoy socializing with friendly neighbours! Please contact Barb to book a showing - you will love your new home and lifestyle! <br /> <br />Please see the pictures in the following link for another one of my rental properties in the same buildng with the same floor plan (this link includes pictures of the building's amenities): <br /> <br />http://www.bmgstudio.com/2625regina1106/ <br /> <br />Condo Unit's Address: <br />2101-2625 Regina St <br />Ottawa, ON K2B 5W8 <br /> <br />Contact: <br /> <br />Barb McIntyre <br />613-728-9214 (Home) <br />613-945-0567 (Work) <br />613-668-9069 (Cell) <br /> <br />donandbarb@outlook.com

item.address: 3455 Dandurand, Rosemont, QC, Canada, H1X1N2
item.description: Address: 3455 Dandurand, Rosemont, QC, Canada, H1X1N2 English follows. <br /> <br />Prés de la Promenade Masson et du Cégep de Rosemont. Non-fumeur. Quartier résidentiel, immeuble tranquille. <br /> <br />Beau studio lumineux, demi sous-sol avec grande fenêtre au-dessus du sol. Grande pièce séparée en 2 par une arche, bel espace, plancher sablé et vernis à neuf, électricité complètement refaite en 2014, appartement repeint en totalité, thermostats électroniques, hotte de cuisine, ventilateur de salle de bain avec minuterie. Cuisinière et réfrigérateur et internet sans-filinclus. <br /> <br />Autobus sur St-Michel en semaine vers station St-Michel (ligne bleue, UDM, etc.) ou Joliette (ligne jaune, centre-ville, Uqam, universités Concordia, McGill, CHUM), autobus sur Masson vers la station Laurier (ligne orange, Plateau), près du Jardin Botanique, hôpital Maisonneuve-Rosemont, etc. Stationnement sur rue. Bixi, Communauto, Car2go et Auto-Mobile disponibles dans le quartier. <br /> <br /> <br />Renovated studio, semi-furnished. Near Promenade Masson and Cégep de Rosemont. Non-smoking. <br /> <br />Half basement, large window above the ground, daylight and privacy. Large room divided in two by an arch, beautiful space, floor just sanded and varnished, electricity completely redone in 2014, apartment repainted in full, accurate electronic thermostats (comfort), extractor kitchen (charcoal filter), bathroom fan timer and external exit. Residential neighborhood, quiet building. Range and refrigerator and wifi included. <br /> <br />Near Promenade Masson (grocery, cafés, bars, restaurants) Cégep de Rosemont, bus on St-Michel to the blue line (UDM, etc.) or yellow line (downtown, UQAM, Concordia and McGill universities, CHUM), bus on Masson to Laurier station (orange line, Plateau). Also near the Botanical Garden, Maisonneuve-Rosemont Hospital, etc. Parking on street. Bixi, Communauto, Car2go and Auto-Mobile available in the neighborhood

item.address: 60 St Clair Ave W, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4V
item.description: Address: 60 St Clair Ave W, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4V Suite is 840 sq. ft. in a 2 bed, 2 bath condo. Condo is equipped with 24/7 concierge, exercise room, mini library, party room, BBQ, and outdoor hot tub. <br /> <br />Inside the suite, there is a living room, a kitchen, 2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms, a walk-in closet, 2 balconies, and washer and dryer in the unit. The kitchen has a granite counter top, all stainless steel appliances including stove, oven, dishwasher, and microwave. Water, gas, locker, and parking are also included. <br /> <br />This condo is located in Toronto's Business District/Bay Corridor. LOCATION is key for this condo, it is in the heart of everything - Eaton Centre, Queen west shopping, OCAD, Ryerson, U of T, AGO, Chinatown, hospitals, theatres, restaurants, clubs, St. Patrick subway access, and the Dundas and 501 Queen streetcars just steps away. This is a great condo to live in for those looking for one minutes away from everything and anything it could lead. <br /> <br />I'm looking for renters who are clean, and can sign a year lease. Please email and leave a phone number to arrange a viewing time preferably this Sunday, Feb 7. Suite is available March1st. <br /> <br />Floorplan: http://www.9t6condos.com/pdfs/mercer.pdf

item.title: Lovely Spacious Two Bedroom W/Vaulted Ceilings In Collingwood
item.address: 37 Leacrest Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4G 1e
item.description: Address: 37 Leacrest Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4G 1e This unit will become available for April 1st. 2016. ( possibly Sooner ) This oversize two bedroom condo is located on Trott Blvd., across the road from Cranberry Inn. It is centrally located and close to all that Blue Mountain has to offer. Just 10 minutes to the Village & ski lifts, 5 minutes to downtown Collingwood and a short walk to the shores of Georgian Bay. This is a large second story unit has vaulted ceilings and lots of natural light, it offers one bedroom (master) with an ensuite bathroom and also one bedroom with an additional three pc. washroom. There is an open concept living room and kitchen area with a vaulted ceiling. This spacious unit can accommodate up to six people. It has a dining area, off the living room area. There is a gas fireplace in the living room. There is a sliding door leading out from the master bedroom and living room onto the deck perfect for barb b - que. There is a beautiful fully equipped kitchen, with all the amenities, including a dishwasher and microwave. There is tile and carpet throughout and the unit also comes with a stacked washer/dryer and plenty of closet space. There is one parking spot in front of the unit and plenty of visitor parking. The condo is available furnished or unfurnished. Rent, + utilities, Non-smoking unit, no pets, Annual /

item.description: Address: 175 Sherbrooke St West, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2X 1X This apartment is located on the 12th floor with a balcony to enjoy an amazing view of Mont Royal. It was completely renovated in September 2015 so everything (floors, paint, kitchen counters/ cabinets, bathroom etc) has been recently redone meaning no work will be required prior to moving in. The price includes ALL utilities (except internet). I am looking for someone to take over a year long lease beginning ideally on May 1st (this can be negotiated if necessary). It is a great apartment and fairly priced for the location. There is a laundry room in the basement, as well as a convenience store and pizza shop located at the front entrance of the building. It is about a 5-10 minute walk to McGill, 5 minutes to St. Laurent and St. Catherine. Don't miss out! Please contact me if you have any questions. Thank you.

item.title: Charm filled ATWATER MARKET Apartment - Available March 1st 2016
item.address: 8220 ONTARiO, Mercier, QC, Canada, H1L 3e
item.description: Address: 8220 ONTARiO, Mercier, QC, Canada, H1L 3e Beautiful 5 1/2 unit downtown montreal on coveted tree lined street, Rue du Souvenir! <br /><br />This unit is roughly 1200 square feet has a massive bedroom, large guest bedroom and a third bedroom/office just off the kitchen. The apartment is on the main floor of a Victorian house and it occupies the entire floor, it has an entrance at the front of the house and one at the back with a beautiful deck, optimal for some sun tanning over the summer! <br /><br />Apartment features:<br />-1200 square feet, I know I already mentioned it but it needs repeating!!!<br />-High ceilings throughout the apartment, roughly 12 ft. <br />-Brick wall throughout - Original brick wall with the cutest little cat prints (on a few spots) on it from when the bricks were shaped.<br />-Massive living room<br />-Recently renovated kitchen with all appliances<br />- Appliances: fridge, stove, dishwasher, ensuite washer and dryer<br />-beautiful glass shower<br />-lots of storage space in the apartment and little closet on the back deck<br />-super friendly and chill landlords (married couple). They truly are amazing, if you have any issues at all they fix it the next day. We had problems with our dishwasher and washing machine, they replaced both within a few days.<br />- Parking spot out back at no extra charge<br /><br />Neighborhood:<br />- The apartment is located on a beautiful tree lined street that looks idyllic in the summer. The street is a private little strip off Atwater, very quiet and the neighbors are amazing.<br />- 15 minute walk to Mount Royal park, I took advantage of the vicinity of the part all summer. Beautiful hike in the park highly preferable to the gym<br />-5 minute walk to Alexis Nihon mall, energie cardio gym, grocery stores (IGA and Adonis)<br />- 10 minute walk to Atwater market, super C grocery store, SAQ<br />- very close to downtown, I have timed it, it is a 12 minute walk from the house to the eaton center downtown. 15 to 20 if you are a slow walker.<br /><br />The lease: <br />My boyfriend and I have been living in this stunning unit for a year and a half now, we LOVE the apartment and the landlord. Sadly we are moving back to Ontario for work reasons and are looking for someone to take over our lease come March 1st.<br />The lease ends July 1st 2016 so you have a total of 3 months left on the lease after which you can renew for another year (the landlord would be thrilled) or move elsewhere.<br /><br />Rent price - 1,500 + Utilities this place is a STEAL for that price considering all of the features.<br /><br />email me if you are interested in having a look at the apartment.<br /><br />This place won't last! And you will love the cat prints!!

item.description: Address: 26 Lancaster Terrace NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T5X 5S4 Opportunity in a convenient area to rent or rent to own!<br />Optional to sign a 6 months/1 year contract or pay month-to-month.<br />A basement suite similar to a bilevel in Shalimar Plaza located across the street from Capilano mall, multiple restaurants and the Capilano bus terminal is right outside the front door as well as many trails and parks to enjoy the rivervalley views. Convenient bus routes include direct busses to the university, whyte ave (that run until 3am), downtown and west Edmonton mall. Open floor plan offers an extremely spacious living room, generous master bedroom with a walk in closet, full bath with window for excess light, and an efficient kitchen with a spacious closet for storage. Heat, water and 1 outdoor parking stall with plugins and plenty of street parking included in rent. Will be upgrading the paint job within the next few weeks, will be available for viewing as soon as Feb.15 (might still be undergoing a paint job), possession as soon as March 1st.<br />Security deposit: Same as rent<br />Rent may also include a loft bed for small families/single parents/storage and a portable dishwasher that connects to sink if requested.<br />Furnished: 1000 (furnishings include queen bed, loft bed, etc. will be discussed if needed)<br />If tenant stays for at least one year, all furniture provided can be taken with you when you leave. If you are interested in a rent to own contract, pls contact Troy at 7802971189 and we will discuss the price when applicable. Pls no emails.

item.description: Address: 1140 Wellington, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3C 1V Magnifique condo de 844 pieds carrés, situé dans un secteur très recherché, à deux pas du parc régional Michel-Chartrand offrant la commodité d'un pied à terre près de tout et la tranquillité d'un espace boisé. Les écureuils et les oiseaux vont rendront souvent visite sur vos deux terrasses privées (avant et arrière)! Cet unité de coin à aire ouverte vous offre la luminosité d'une abondante fenestration, un voisinage tranquille et sympathique, deux chambres à coucher, un espace de rangement intérieur et un autre à l'extérieur, l'air climatisé et une salle de lavage. Une visite vous convaincra!

There is lots of greenspace and many parks off of the path. <br />-Greenboro public library is a 5 minute walk down the bike path.
